title: Misfit unveils the Shine 2 Fitness and Sleep Monitor, priced at $99.99
text:
Misfit unveils the Shine 2 Fitness and Sleep Monitor, priced at $99.99 
Published By: Neowin.net - Yesterday 
Compatible with iOS, Android and Windows Phone, the Shine 2 is water-resistant and promises up to 6 months of battery life. Built from 'airc...
